title: Risk factors
creator_credit: Roger Hudson, Jim Dale, National Heart Foundation of Australia, Suatu Film Management and Mediacast
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Help yourself to health”.
Focuses on the main risk factors in coronary heart disease: prolonged high blood pressure, smoking, excessive fat in diet leading to elevated blood cholesterol levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Roger Hudson, Jim Dale, National Heart Foundation of Australia, Suatu Film Management and Mediacast
